con:testCase.name: 2-1. CTR-CTRA blocking

con:config.con:query: select * from overstappen.soap_transactions where st_transaction_id = '${#TestCase#transactionId}'
select * from overstappen.raw_soap_xml_messages where rsxm_st_id = '${#TestCase#Id}'
Select * from overstappen.message_logging where msl_soap_transaction_id = '${#TestCase#transactionId}'
select * from overstappen.contract_termination_dossier where ctd_switchid = '${#TestSuite#Recipient}-${#TestSuite#Donor}-${#TestCase#ContractId}-01'

select DM.*, IT.IT_INTERFACE_TYPE from overstappen.dossier_messages DM left join overstappen.interface_type IT on DM.dm_it_id = IT.id where dm_ctd_id = ${#TestCase#ctdId} and dm_mst_id=1 order by createddate desc
select * from overstappen.soap_transactions where st_sender='${#TestSuite#recipient}' and st_receiver='${#TestSuite#donor}' and st_send_received='SEND' and id>${#TestCase#Id}

select * from overstappen.soap_xml_messages where sxm_xml_message like '%${#TestSuite#recipient}-${#TestSuite#donor}-${#TestCase#ContractId}-01%' and sxm_xml_message like '%/${#TestSuite#donorSoapVersion}%' and sxm_xml_message_type = 'Request' and sxm_sender = '${#TestSuite#recipient}' and sxm_receiver = '${#TestSuite#donor}'

select * from overstappen.soap_xml_messages where sxm_xml_message like '%${#TestSuite#recipient}-${#TestSuite#donor}-${#TestCase#ContractId}-01%' and sxm_xml_message_type = 'Request' and sxm_sender = '${#TestSuite#recipient}' and sxm_receiver = '${#TestSuite#donor}'
select * from overstappen.email_logging el join overstappen.email_logging_detail eld on el.el_detail_id = eld.id where el_rsxm_id = '${#TestCase#ctrRSXMId}'

con:configuration.content: New Request received on COMP for ${#TestSuite#Recipient}-${#TestSuite#Donor}-${#TestCase#ContractId}-01. Please respond on this request within 24 working day hours with a Request Answer*

select DM.*, IT.IT_INTERFACE_TYPE from overstappen.dossier_messages DM left join overstappen.interface_type IT on DM.dm_it_id = IT.id where dm_ctd_id = ${#TestCase#ctdId} and dm_mst_id=3 order by createddate desc

select * from overstappen.soap_xml_messages where sxm_xml_message like '%${#TestSuite#recipient}-${#TestSuite#donor}-${#TestCase#ContractId}-01%' and sxm_xml_message like '%/${#TestSuite#soapVersion}%' and sxm_xml_message_type = 'Request answer' and sxm_sender = '${#TestSuite#donor}' and sxm_receiver = '${#TestSuite#recipient}'

select * from overstappen.soap_xml_messages where sxm_xml_message like '%${#TestCase#switchId}%' and sxm_xml_message_type = 'Request answer' and sxm_sender = '${#TestSuite#donor}' and sxm_receiver = '${#TestSuite#recipient}' --and sxm_retry_count <=1

select * from overstappen.soap_xml_messages where sxm_xml_message like '%${#TestSuite#recipient}-${#TestSuite#donor}-${#TestCase#ContractId}-01%' and sxm_xml_message_type = 'Change' and sxm_sender = '${#TestSuite#recipient}' and sxm_receiver = '${#TestSuite#donor}'

select * from overstappen.soap_xml_messages where sxm_xml_message like '%${#TestSuite#recipient}-${#TestSuite#donor}-${#TestCase#ContractId}-01%' and sxm_xml_message_type = 'Change' and sxm_sender = '${#TestSuite#recipient}' and sxm_receiver = '${#TestSuite#donor}'
select * from overstappen.contract_termination_dossier where id='${#TestCase#ctdId}'

select DM.*, IT.IT_INTERFACE_TYPE from overstappen.dossier_messages DM left join overstappen.interface_type IT on DM.dm_it_id = IT.id where dm_ctd_id = ${#TestCase#ctdId} and dm_mst_id=9 order by createddate desc

select * from overstappen.soap_xml_messages where sxm_xml_message like '%${#TestSuite#recipient}-${#TestSuite#donor}-${#TestCase#ContractId}-01%' and sxm_xml_message like '%<blocking>Y</blocking>%' and sxm_xml_message_type = 'Change answer' and sxm_sender = '${#TestSuite#donor}' and sxm_receiver = '${#TestSuite#recipient}'

select * from overstappen.soap_xml_messages where sxm_xml_message like '%${#TestCase#switchId}%' and sxm_xml_message_type = 'Change answer' and sxm_sender = '${#TestSuite#donor}' and sxm_receiver = '${#TestSuite#recipient}'
select * from overstappen.soap_transactions where st_transaction_id = '${#TestCase#ctcTransactionId}'
select * from overstappen.raw_soap_xml_messages where rsxm_st_id = '${#TestCase#ctcId}'
Select * from overstappen.message_logging where msl_soap_transaction_id = '${#TestCase#ctcTransactionId}'
select * from overstappen.contract_termination_dossier where id = '${#TestCase#ctdId}'

con:assertion.name: Xpath: Check for existance of CTD record

con:config.con:query: select DM.*, IT.IT_INTERFACE_TYPE from overstappen.dossier_messages DM left join overstappen.interface_type IT on DM.dm_it_id = IT.id where dm_ctd_id = ${#TestCase#ctdId} and dm_mst_id=11 order by createddate desc

select * from overstappen.soap_xml_messages where sxm_xml_message like '%${#TestSuite#recipient}-${#TestSuite#donor}-${#TestCase#contractId}-01%' and sxm_xml_message like '%/${#TestSuite#donorSoapVersion}%' and sxm_xml_message_type = 'Cancel' and sxm_sender = '${#TestSuite#recipient}' and sxm_receiver = '${#TestSuite#donor}'

select * from overstappen.soap_xml_messages where sxm_xml_message like '%${#TestSuite#recipient}-${#TestSuite#donor}-${#TestCase#ContractId}-01%' and sxm_xml_message like '%/${#TestSuite#donorSoapVersion}%' and sxm_xml_message_type = 'Performed' and sxm_sender = '${#TestSuite#recipient}' and sxm_receiver = '${#TestSuite#donor}' --and sxm_retry_count <=1
